commands.name: python-install
commands.description: Asks for a repository, then runs the command in shell: pip install {repo entered}.
commands.code:
import subprocess
repo = input('Enter the repository to install: ')
subprocess.run(['pip', 'install', repo])

commands.name: python-line
commands.description: Runs a line of Python code.
commands.code:
code_line = input('Enter the Python code to run: ')
exec(code_line)

commands.name: python-run
commands.code:
import subprocess
script_path = input('Enter the path to the Python script: ')
subprocess.run(['python', script_path])
